metadata.title: CVE-2021-46709 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
phpLiteAdmin through 1.9.8.2 allows XSS via the index.php newRows parameter(aka num or number).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpliteadmin - 1.9.7.1-1ubuntu0.3
phpliteadmin-themes - 1.9.7.1-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpliteadmin package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.7.1-1ubuntu0.3').
